> Topics in today's digest:
>
> 1. Levels for banded
> From: Peter Cox <pcox@...>
>
>
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>
>Message: 1
> Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 09:26:11 -0500
> From: Peter Cox <pcox@...>
>Subject: Levels for banded
>
>Hi all,
>I just hit 102 in smithing last night, and I still have a pretty high
>failure rate for some pieces of banded (especially cloaks - I'm 0 for 20
>with those for some reason). Does anyone know the levels at which the
>various banded pieces become trivial (and thus their difficulty)?
>
>I know that bracers are trivial for me, and gorgets probably are too, but
>what about the rest?
>
>Thanks
>
>--
>---------------------------------------------------------------------------
--
>Peter Cox - Systems Administrator, Phone: (847) 467 1842
>Kellogg Graduate School of Management, Fax: (847) 467 3500
>Northwestern University. Email: p-cox@...
>---------------------------------------------------------------------------
--
>"Would you tell me, please, which way I ought to go from here?"
>
>"That depends a good deal on where you want to get to," said the Cat
> -- Lewis Carrol
>
>
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>

This should be of some help.
MINIMUM SKILL CHART

Item Name--Skill Required--Sheets: Needed:
Metal bits--(10)
Files--(10)
Steel Boning-- (40)
Studs--(40)
Gorgets--(50)--(1 sheet)
Bracers--(55)--(1 sheet)
Boots--(55)--(1 sheet)
Mask--(60)--(2 sheets)
Sleeves--(60)--(2 sheets)
Helm--(60)--(2 sheets)
Mantle--(80)--(2 sheets)
Belt--(85)--(2 sheets)
Leggings--(100)--(3 sheets)
Tunics--(100)--( 3 sheets)
Cloaks--(145+)--( 3 sheets)

These shall provide about a 20-30 % chance to make but it should be enough
to make a profit for continued learning.

LeifLuss
